basics.name: Amritpal Singh
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with experience using frontend and backend technologies such as Ruby, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, and
React. I have a background in Electrical Engineering and Tax Accounting. Previously worked 6 plus years as a lead IT
Technician, I bring strong skills in collaborating with teams, solving problems, by using innovative ideas, and creativity for

highlights: Built and maintained strong relationships with clients over six-plus years. Assisted CPA with taxes and helped to create 100+ new client accounts.
Prepared personal and small business taxes for over 500 + clients. Introduced cloud software for the firm which allowed employees to work remotely.
Led the project that transformed the digital platform of documents and workflow to a server while syncing the data across various devices.
Solved a major crisis as the company's main computers suffered data failure by retrieving the data from the backup servers.

education.institution: New York City College of Technology

tech skills.name: Ruby, Rails, JavaScript, React, PostgreSQL, SQLite, ActiveRecord, HTML/CSS, JWT, RESTful API, OOP, JSON, MVC, Git,
Bootstrap, Semantic UI.
